aboutInfo: I am Apascaritei Elias-Olivian, a Senior Software Development Engineer with 8+ years of experience. I specialize in Scala development and have worked on various projects utilizing technologies such as Java, Salesforce, JavaScript, AngularJs, RabbitMQ, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and AWS. Recently, I focused on building a Microservice platform in Scala using Akka for event-driven programming and REST/RabbitMQ for interservice communication. I am also enthusiastic about learning new technologies like TensorFlow and ML in my spare time. I am committed to delivering high-quality software solutions and collaborating with talented individuals. Feel free to explore my portfolio and contact me for further information or collaboration opportunities.
